local_intent: Lower to gently contact the bread and secure a stable grasp, with visibility check, precise alignment, retry on missed contact, and post-grasp verification.
assumptions: Bread target identifier is valid for perception and control
Force threshold of 10 is suitable for detecting light contact without deforming the bread
coherence_with_global: Matches the grasp phase: confirm visibility, align, lower until contact (with retries), then close gripper and verify stability, consistent with GLOBAL_BT and description.
